step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK (PID) (SELECT LINK_PID FROM RW_LINK WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK (PID) (SELECT LINK_PID FROM RW_LINK WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM RW_NODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM RW_NODE WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RW_LINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM RW_LINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM RW_NODE_MESH M, TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE N WHERE N.PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1)) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM RW_LINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM RW_NODE_MESH M, TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE N WHERE N.PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1)) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RW_FEATURE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT CN.FEATURE_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK N, RW_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.FEATURE_PID!=0 AND CN.FEATURE_PID!=-1);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RW_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM RW_LINK P, TEMP_RW_FEATURE T WHERE P.FEATURE_PID = T.PID);
INSERT/*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK(PID)(SELECT PID FROM TEMP_RW_LINK);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM RW_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM RW_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEID (PID) (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM RD_NAME P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT P1.NAME_GROUPID FROM RW_LINK_NAME P1,TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T1 WHERE P1.LINK_PID=T1.PID AND P.NAME_GROUPID = P1.NAME_GROUPID));
SELECT P.* FROM RW_FEATURE P,TEMP_RW_FEATURE T WHERE P.FEATURE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RW_LINK P,TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RW_LINK_NAME P,TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RW_NODE P,TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RW_NODE_MESH P,TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RW_FEATURE P WHERE P.FEATURE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RW_FEATURE T );
DELETE FROM RW_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RW_LINK_NAME P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RW_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE T );
DELETE FROM RW_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RW_FEATURE SELECT FEATURE_PID FROM RW_FEATURE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RW_FEATURE B WHERE A.FEATURE_PID = B.FEATURE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM RW_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RW_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM RW_NODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RW_NODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
